titleStmt.title: The declaration of the Right Honourable Henry, Earle of Cumberland, together with diverse gentlemen of the county of York, who desire it may be put in print, and published in all the parish churches of this county, 26 August, 1642
titleStmt.author: Cumberland, Henry Clifford, Earl of, 1591-1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Barker ... and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
